text: The 2019 AMJ Campbell Shorty Jenkins Classic was held September 10 to 15 in Cornwall, Ontario. The total purse for the event was $59,000 for the Men's and $34,500 for the Women's. In the Men's final, John Epping defeated Brad Jacobs 5-3 in an all Ontario matchup. In the Women's final, Jennifer Jones defeated Tracy Fleury 6-4 in an all Manitoba affair. ==Men== ===Teams=== The teams are listed as follows: {| class=wikitable |- ! Skip !! Third !! Second !!
